name: postcss-remove-duplicate-values

1.0.0.name: postcss-remove-duplicate-values
1.0.0.description: A PostCSS plugin that removes duplicate CSS property values within rules, optimizing stylesheet size and improving maintainability.

2.0.0.name: postcss-remove-duplicate-values
2.0.0.description: 🚀 PostCSS plugin that intelligently removes duplicate CSS properties, reduces bundle size, and improves CSS maintainability. Handles !important declarations, vendor prefixes, and selector filtering with zero configuration.

description: 🚀 PostCSS plugin that intelligently removes duplicate CSS properties, reduces bundle size, and improves CSS maintainability. Handles !important declarations, vendor prefixes, and selector filtering with zero configuration.
